contributionDescription: Optimism can protect against depression — even for people who are at risk for it. An optimistic outlook makes people more resistant to stress. Optimism may even help people live longer. The best thing about optimism is you can learn it, even if your outlook tends to be more pessimistic
impactDescription: Optimism can protect against depression — even for people who are at risk for it. An optimistic outlook makes people more resistant to stress. Optimism may even help people live longer. The best thing about optimism is you can learn it, even if your outlook tends to be more pessimistic
pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged because it doesn't provide a clear, relevant explanation of the applicant's actual contributions and their impact on the Web3/blockchain space, violating rule 10. The provided information is more about the concept of 'optimism', not the related digital systems.
pwRecategorizeReason: NO, the application seems to be mis-categorized. Despite being labeled as an "INDIVIDUAL" the content of the application refers to  "Optimism" which is a known project in the blockchain/Web3 space rather than an individual's contribution.
pwCategorySuggestions: Content Creation, Community Building, User Experience & Adoption
